pageContext.claim: “And the Democrats want to invite caravan after caravan of illegal aliens into our country. And they want to sign them up for free health care, free welfare, free education, and for the right to vote. They want to sign 'em for the right to vote.”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats do not say they want caravans of immigrants entering the country. Trump comes close here to suggesting that Democrats may be secretly organizing or funding the caravan, which is a baseless conspiracy theory he has floated at other points.
